text: The Palácio Tiradentes (Portuguese for "Tiradentes Palace") is a historic building in the Centro neighborhood in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. It is named in honor of the Brazilian revolutionary Tiradentes. It was the former seat of the Chamber of Deputies of Brazil, between 1926 and 1960, and is the current seat of the Legislative Assembly of the State of Rio de Janeiro. == Gallery == File:Plenário do Palácio Tiradentes 01.jpg|Interior File:Palácio Tiradentes (4044567572).jpg|Façade File:Plenário do Palácio Tiradentes 02.jpg|Dome File:Palácio Tiradentes.
